definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Some of Pedini collections includes nice re-invent of inline kitchen layouts.
sentences.chinese: 一些佩蒂尼的产品包含了重新发明的内嵌厨具布局。

sentences.english: Gardens in Japan, though of Chinese parentage, have more conventions and less complexity in lay-out than the Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 日本园林，虽然源于中国，布局的习俗化大于复杂化。

sentences.english: Before you drop the bafl into the spinntng well, you bet a number on the layout.
sentences.chinese: 在你把小球投入转盘之前，先在布局上赌个号码。

sentences.english: Edit text, colors, styling, and layout using the new tablet UI look.
sentences.chinese: 编辑文本，色彩，造型和布局使用新的UI看片。

sentences.english: Lastly, it discusses the layout of the warehouse and optimization of the goods location.
sentences.chinese: 最后，论述了仓库的布局和货位优化问题。

sentences.english: Symmetrically on both sides of the layout, built auxiliary building.
sentences.chinese: 两侧呈对称布局，建有匡助修建。

sentences.english: The marketing schemes of mini-type and medium-sized enterprises are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了中小涂料企业市场营销布局的经验。

sentences.english: You can re-enable them from layout configuration later.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在“布局配置”中重新启用它们。

sentences.english: One major concern for a rich user interface is layout management.
sentences.chinese: 对于富用户界面，一个重要的方面就是布局管理。

sentences.english: Multiple columns are used in magazine layouts and portfolios.
sentences.chinese: 多栏常被用在杂志布局和大项目中。

sentences.english: In the article structural configuration, we use the traditional research pattern of special book.
sentences.chinese: 在文章结构布局上，我们采用传统的专书研究的格局。

sentences.english: Port street layout can be traced to the 16th century hero stabbed in Hong Kong was first built.
sentences.chinese: 港口街道布局可追搠到16世纪英雄港初建时。

sentences.english: A study has been made on the determination of locating orien…
sentences.chinese: 还对矩形物体布局时定位方向的确定进行了研究。

sentences.english: The physical layouts of classrooms vary. Initially, student desks stand in rows.
sentences.chinese: 课堂里的实体布局变化，首先是，课桌排成行。
这是一个单页的页面布局。

sentences.english: After urban layout, one must consider transportation.
sentences.chinese: 除了城市布局，我们还必须考虑交通问题。

definition: to ratchet up/to raise (expectations etc)/to increase (a quota, a position in the market etc)/to up the ante/(computing) to encode
deep plowing/thorough penetration/thorough development (of a market segment etc)
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
